mapper.insert: insert into T_MERCHANT (ID, ACCOUNT_NO, REAL_NAME, PWD, CARD_TYPE, CARD_NO, MOBILE, TELPHONE, SEX, EMAIL, ADDRESS, BANK_DEPOSIT, ACCOUNT_NAME, BANK_ACCT_NO, DT_CREATE, DT_LASTMOD, OPERATORS, REMARK, SUPERIOR, MER_TYPE, RECOMMENDER_ID, PROFIT_RATE, STATUS, MER_LEVEL, ORG_CODE, FAPIAO_FLAG, MER_CODE, ACTIVE_STATU, BRAND_ID, BUSINESS_LOGO, SENSITIVE_INF, YIN_JIA, MOBILE_STATU, DAILY, BANK_FIRM, EFF_CODE, COMPANY, IS_CANCEL) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankDeposit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAcctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtCreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtLastmod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operators,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{superior,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{merType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recommenderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{profitRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fapiaoFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activeStatu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{businessLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sensitiveInf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yinJia,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileStatu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daily,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankFirm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isCancel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update T_MERCHANT set ACCOUNT_NO = #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAL_NAME = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PWD = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_TYPE = #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_NO = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELPHONE = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_DEPOSIT = #{bankDeposit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_ACCT_NO = #{bankAcctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DT_CREATE = #{dtCreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DT_LASTMOD = #{dtLastmod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATORS = #{operators,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPERIOR = #{superior,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MER_TYPE = #{merType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECOMMENDER_ID = #{recommenderId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROFIT_RATE = #{profitRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MER_LEVEL = #{merLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAPIAO_FLAG = #{fapiaoFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MER_CODE = #{merCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTIVE_STATU = #{activeStatu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUSINESS_LOGO = #{businessLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SENSITIVE_INF = #{sensitiveInf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YIN_JIA = #{yinJia,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_STATU = #{mobileStatu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAILY = #{daily,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_FIRM = #{bankFirm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EFF_CODE = #{effCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_CANCEL = #{isCancel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, ACCOUNT_NO, REAL_NAME, PWD, CARD_TYPE, CARD_NO, MOBILE, TELPHONE, SEX, EMAIL, ADDRESS, BANK_DEPOSIT, ACCOUNT_NAME, BANK_ACCT_NO, DT_CREATE, DT_LASTMOD, OPERATORS, REMARK, SUPERIOR, MER_TYPE, RECOMMENDER_ID, PROFIT_RATE, STATUS, MER_LEVEL, ORG_CODE, FAPIAO_FLAG, MER_CODE, ACTIVE_STATU, BRAND_ID, BUSINESS_LOGO, SENSITIVE_INF, YIN_JIA, MOBILE_STATU, DAILY, BANK_FIRM, EFF_CODE, COMPANY, IS_CANCEL from T_MERCHANT where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
